name: Ben's Maze
description:
Well well well, look at you. You've found yourself in Uncle Ben's maze. You naughty girl you~

This is a simple maze game based off an older twitter meme. I know that other clones exist, but hey, I'm bored and have some vague sense of how to use unity.

This is something I made in 90 minutes out of boredom. I'm not sure I'll ever update the game, but feel free to suggest updates or changes to me!

UPDATE: Well, Ben heard that you've enjoyed his maze and decided to make a special appearance for you. Don't let Uncle Ben get you!
